Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior, which is slightly grooved, is covered with a brown slip and faint traces of a red-painted cursive text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394935) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394935)
